articles.title: Mark Cuban Says 'It's Interesting' The Trump Administration Quietly Offered A Form Of UBI Through HSA Contributions, And 'No One Noticed' It
articles.mainIdea: Mark Cuban Says 'It's Interesting' The Trump Administration Quietly Offered A Form Of UBI Through HSA Contributions, And 'No One Noticed' It
articles.summary: Benzinga: Mark Cuban Says 'It's Interesting' The Trump Administration Quietly Offered A Form Of UBI Through HSA Contributions, And 'No One Noticed' It. Billionaire entrepreneur Mark Cuban believes the government may have slipped in a version of universal basic income without anyone realizing it. And he thinks it came through an unexpected path: Health savings accounts. Cuban Sees Hidden UBI in Trump-Era HSA Expansion “I think it’s interesting that the [Trump] administration offered a UBI program, hidden behind direct HSA contributions, and no one noticed,” Cuban wrote in a post on X recently. articles.title: Honda to Buy Ohio Battery Plant Assets From LGES for $2.9B
articles.mainIdea: Honda to Buy Ohio Battery Plant Assets From LGES for $2.9B
articles.summary: Zacks: Honda to Buy Ohio Battery Plant Assets From LGES for $2.9B. HMC is set to buy Ohio battery plant building assets from LG Energy Solution for about $2.9 billion, aiming to boost efficiency at its JV ahead of 2025 operations. Related tickers mentioned: 373220.KS, HMC, HNDAF, OPLN.

articles.title: Tesla Under Scrutiny Due to Model 3 Door Release Concerns
articles.mainIdea: Tesla Under Scrutiny Due to Model 3 Door Release Concerns
articles.summary: Zacks: Tesla Under Scrutiny Due to Model 3 Door Release Concerns. TSLA faces an NHTSA probe into Model 3 door releases, with claims that emergency controls are hidden, unlabeled, and difficult to find in critical situations. Related tickers mentioned: OPLN, TSLA.
